# mypk

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of mypk is to simplify the codes in the shiny app I built.

## Installation

You can install the released version of mypk from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("mypk")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("etc5523-2020/r-package-assessment-foolnhungry")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(mypk)
## basic example code
```
